issue.title: gyazo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gyazo.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgyazo.com) ### Comment > When I allow gyazo.com it ignores it and keeps blocking it on iOS AdGuard Pro > > I don’t know if it’s a filter or dns or what’s force blocking it, but it’s very annoying. I use gyazo every single day to take screenshots to show my clients. I pay yearly for it. I don’t understand how such a website can be blocked. Username: `@G13n0001` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r3ztodxm05wo4gs48kkk4c8wowwo04cr4zygc808g0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lrmuba907eo0o884804c0oscsk4wk4w2a04y9y7ydw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pz38fgz4pusw44coc4okss4g40sw04wi56igvn3yvs.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/j5ysue79foggw4k44sw8cgscs88kc8w55ushtn86yo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.5 License type: | paid DNS filtering: | server: `https://doh.cleanbrowsing.org/doh/security-filter`
filters: `Adguard dns filter` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

AdGuard Base,
EasyList

comment.body:
Issue is caused by your selected custom DNS:
Please report the issue to their support::

https://cleanbrowsing.org/help/


Alternatively you can select another DNS like Google.

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://shopee.co.id/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fshopee.co.id%2F) ### Comment > please consider adding the following parameters to the adguard filter > ```adblock-filter-list > ||shopee.co.id^$removeparam=sp_atk > ||shopee.co.id^$removeparam=xptdk > ||shopee.co.id^$removeparam=publish_id > ||shopee.co.id^$removeparam=promotionId > ``` > > I have tested it and it works without damaging anything ### Screenshots
